divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside with my daughter, my wife had just driven off when a white light that had the appearance of a star flew overhead stopped above us and shined a blinding light down on us for about 10 seconds. The light then went south with 3 jets following behind it, they appeared to be chasing the light. I would estimate the light being 300 feet in the air. Being aware of a previous incident that was reported on Mufon from this area, I have been watching the sky at night and noticed a light like this moving way to fast to be a star and too low to the ground to be a satellite on several occasions, but never had it shine a light on us before. I have seen a light like this stop and turn at a 90 degree angle then speed across the sky on several occassions. There have been a lot of jets and airplanes late at night, which I've not noticed before.
Summary: Star like light low to ground, stopped shined a light down on us
trends: There has been one other sighting in Buffalo
